entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:58 PM PST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 4.
